2010-10-07

It makes me feel better #7 The Pleasure Seekers

Had never heard of The Pleasure Seekers until about 10 mins ago when @randomrecs blipped/tweeted this song - but it's a sensational bit of 60s garage rock and features a pre-Devil Gate Drive Suzi Quatro...

and this is how I'll always remember Suzi...

or maybe like this...
